form.name: measles_with_eye_or_mouth_complications_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Fever> Measles with Eye or Mouth Complications Two

field.name: If mouth ulcers persist, treat with gentian violet
Teach mother/caregiver how to prevent child from drinking or swallowing gentian violet
Treat any skin irritation with calamine lotion by applying to the affected areas
Give paracetamol to reduce fever (temperature ≥ 38.5°C), as given below:
Give first dose of paracetamol in clinic
Advise mother/caregiver to give paracetamol every 6 hours until fever or pain is gone
Advise mother/caregiver when to return for care immediately
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick child
Advise mother/caregiver to follow-up in 2 days
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
